Present location: BIBLIOTHECA ALEXANDRINA ANTIQUETIES MUSEUM [01/027] ALEXANDRIA BAAM
Name: Cresset in the Shape of a Lotus Flower
Description: This cresset, or small torch, made of baked clay, is in the shape of a lotus flower. The artist used many different types of lines to decorate this piece.It is divided into four parts: the first, or uppermost, part is decorated with long lines; the second with hatched lines; the third part with inclined lines and the fourth part is decorated with inverted triangles without bases.
